Controller

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is the server side of the Serial Killer MUD. The server communicates with clients, sends and receives commands, etc.
    Author:
    Team Alpha-Super-Awesome-Cool-Dynamite-Wolf-Squadron
